Articles.Content:
when you're typing a description for a craft thats kinda long it starts getting buggy, like you cant scroll down most of the times, wich is really annoying.

we need a bar on the side of the description where you can just drag it down without all the glitchy scrolling mess, or a button where you can expand the description and read it fully
Why would a craft description be that long?
Even the stock craft descriptions are too long to read, because they go out of the box and there is no way to scroll.

1 hour ago, UranianBlue said:

Why would a craft description be that long?

Folks use them for all sorts of things. Handling notes for spaceplanes, reminders of which mod parts they've used, or just bits and pieces of roleplaying or story telling as they go along.
I don't think we need either a scroll bar or a expand button. We need both.
I think it should be a pop-up box like they have for sub assemblies.
